channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Trump Administration Wants to Achieve ‘Pax Silica’ Through AI. Here’s What That Means
item.description: Trump administration's global influence strategy runs through the AI supply chain.

item.title: Google lance la vente en ligne par l’IA générative
item.description: Réaliser des recherches de produits, acheter et échanger avec les services clients des revendeurs, c’est la promesse de la dernière version professionnelle de Gemini, présentée dimanche par Google, qui espère ainsi transformer la vente en ligne tout en gardant les utilisateurs sur son outil d’intelligence artificielle (IA).

item.title: Google's new commerce framework cranks up the heat on 'agentic shopping'
item.description: To further push the limits of consumerism, Google has launched a new open standard for agentic commerce that's called Universal Commerce Protocol (UCP). In brief, it's a framework that combines the power of AI agents and online shopping platforms to help customers buy more things. Thanks to the introduction of UCP, Google is offering three new online shopping features. To start, Google's AI mode will have a new checkout feature that allows customers to buy eligible products from certain US retailers within Google Search. Currently, this feature works with Google Pay, but it will soon add PayPa...

item.title: DC’s Tournament Arc Comic Adds ‘Mortal Kombat’ and Annabelle, Cuz Why Not
item.description: Here come some new challengers to 'DC K.O.,' which just further turns the whole event into a mini-version of 'Injustice 3.'

item.title: Bitcoin Mining is Being Used to Offset Heating Costs in Greenhouses and Homes
item.description: Of course, bitcoin critics would argue there is nothing truly gained here in terms of energy efficiency.

item.title: You won't believe this, but Khadas Mind Pro mini PC actually fits an RTX 5060 Ti graphics card, 64GB RAM, and 2TB NVMe SSD in just 0.43 liters
item.description: New Khadas packs insane hardware into a 0.43 liters capacity, while leaving cooling and thermal management a complete mystery.

item.title: Minisforum beats Dell, HP and Lenovo to unveil first Ryzen AI 9 HX470 PC — AI X1 Pro-470 mini PC supports 12TB SSD storage and up to 128GB DDR5
item.description: Minisforum beats Dell, HP and Lenovo to unveil first Ryzen AI 9 HX470 mini PC - AI X1 Pro-470 supports 12TB SSD storage and up to 128GB DDR5.
